description: Intentionally obtaining PHI without authorization for commercial advantage personal gain or malicious harm
Intentionally disclosing PHI without authorization for commercial advantage personal gain or malicious harm
Intentionally obtaining and disclosing the same PHI without authorization
Intentionally accessing or attempting to access healthcare information systems knowing you lack authorization
Knowing misuse of PHI causing identifiable harm or risk to health safety or well-being of any individual

imprisonment_duration: Up to 20 years or life in aggravated cases
description: Second or subsequent conviction for willfully obtaining or disclosing PHI with intent to harm
Entity criminal liability for employee actions obtaining or disclosing PHI for corporate benefit
Two or more persons agreeing to knowingly obtain or disclose PHI without authorization

imprisonment_duration: Additional 10 years on top of base sentence
description: If offense involves exceeding unauthorized access on computer or network
If misuse of PHI results in identity theft or financial fraud to individuals
